attributes.action: dogs to be kept on a lead and muzzled all times in public and residential areas.
attributes.background: I would like the government to take action regarding this as there have been quite  a few attacks by dogs recently and this shouldn’t be ignored therefore I am requesting this petition to be heard.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make it compulsory for all dogs to be on leads on public land: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569074
